title: For all practical purposes. Statistics. 2
brief_description: Behind the headlines In this episode Sol Garfunkel looks in greater detail at sampling methods for collecting statistical data. Examples include employment surveys done by the Bureau of Statistics and medical tests on the effect of aspirin on the incidence of heart disease.
